recipe.title: White Bean Dip with Chips and Sticks
ingredients: 3 15-ounce cans cannellini (white kidney beans), rinsed, drained
Fresh vegetables (such as carrot sticks, celery sticks and cauliflower)
instructions: Finely chop garlic in processor. Add beans and lemon juice and puree. Mix in oil, cumin and chili powder. Season with salt and pepper. Add 3 tablespoons cilantro and mix in using on/off turns. Transfer to large bowl. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.) Sprinkle dip with cilantro. Serve with vegetables and chips.
